1.9.name: wordpress/sobeks-post-in-category
1.9.description:
Displays a list of the posts in one or more categories in virtually any way you want. Please read read this post for installation and usage.

**IMPORTANT ** If you are upgrading from a version before 1.9 please read this post very carefully. There are changes in the syntax.

Features

  • Very small,
  • Easy to use,
  • Extremely flexible

What can you do with it?

  • Display a list of the posts from one or more categories as joint or seperate lists
  • Use the plugin multiple times in your pages, posts, header, footer, sidebar
  • Limit the number of posts displayed
  • Put the result on show as ordered, unordered or comma-separated list
  • Sort the output by post
